pr_title: GraphQL: Add Option For Separated Arguments

timeline.message:
Add Option For Separated Arguments

- Add option to provide arguments using variables (i.e. not inline)

Signed-off-by: ricekot <ricekot@gmail.com>

Add Option For Separated Arguments

- Add option to provide arguments using variables (i.e. not inline)

Signed-off-by: ricekot <ricekot@gmail.com>

- Add option to provide arguments using variables (i.e. not inline)

Signed-off-by: ricekot <ricekot@gmail.com>

Add Option For Separated Arguments

- Add an option to provide arguments using variables.
- Stop query generation when a new session is created.

Signed-off-by: ricekot <ricekot@gmail.com>

Add Option For Separated Arguments

- Add an option to provide arguments using variables.
- Stop query generation when a new session is created.

Signed-off-by: ricekot <ricekot@gmail.com>

timeline.author: thc202

timeline.bodyText: We should clear the list too, to not keep references to the threads longer than needed (ideally the thread/parser would remove itself once done too).
timeline.author: thc202

timeline.bodyText: This should be synchronised (e.g. wrap with Collections.synchronizedList), to not add while looping (which would lead to a ConcurrentModificationException).
timeline.author: thc202
